backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic implemented.
feature_evidence.json: Evidence report listing two deployment-related features and the frontend files involved.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files for reference in build planning.
frontend/deployment/production-domain.tx: Specifies the valid production domain string 'for-my-yellow'.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers and OKLCH color variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root app with an error boundary wrapping ProposalLayout and ProposalPage.
frontend/src/components/BackgroundMusicC: Music control widget managing audio playback, volume, mute, and UI popover.
frontend/src/components/CuteRingAnimatio: Animated ring image component with sparkle effects and safe asset loading.
frontend/src/components/HeartConfetti.ts: Generates and animates 50 falling heart confetti pieces on celebration.
frontend/src/components/LoveLetterEnvelo: Envelope view component that displays an interactive 'tap to open' animation.
A 'No' button that jumps to random positions and cycles playful messages.
frontend/src/components/ProposalLayout.t: Page layout with hearts background, content container, music controls, and footer.
frontend/src/config/proposalCopy.ts: Contains customizable proposal text, acceptance messages, and rotating 'No' button messages.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor via React Query, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file exporting nothing because no backend queries are needed.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global styles, Tailwind layers, color variables, custom animations, and romantic themed UI effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/ProposalPage.tsx: Renders the proposal flow with asking, envelope reveal, and acceptance states using animations and themed components.
frontend/src/utils/assetUrl.ts: Generates correct asset URLs respecting the deployment base path.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, animations, and plugins for the project's styling system.
project_state.json: Tracks project requirements, existing features, deployment issues, and overall proposal site planning state.
